name: confyeti-common-modules
description: Common node modules used by the Confyeti API

scripts.deploy: npm run clean & npm run zip & npm run publish
scripts.publish: aws2 --profile confyeti lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name confyeti-common-modules --zip-file fileb://../common-modules.zip --compatible-runtimes nodejs12.x

author: Momentum Code
